short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience our AI-Powered Amazon Listing Optimizer for e-commerce success. Maximize sales potential with optimized product listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the difference that LittleKris's AI-Powered Amazon Listing Optimizer Chrome Plugin can make for your e-commerce success. Take the guesswork out of product optimization and start maximizing your sales potential today.
体验 LittleKris 的 AI 支持的亚马逊列表优化器 Chrome 插件可以为您的电子商务成功带来的改变。 消除产品优化中的猜测，立即开始最大限度地发挥您的销售潜力。

LittleKris's AI-Powered Amazon Listing Optimizer, using openai's model (gpt-3.5-turbo) as the core, perform better.
LittleKris 的亚马逊listing人工智能优化器，采用openai的模型（gpt-3.5-turbo）作为内核来驱动，表现更为出色。

We will continue to update prompt words to train gpt to give more appropriate responses.
我们将持续更新提示词来训练gpt给出更合适的反应。

This Extension is currently only runs on the Amazon Listing pages of US sites.
本插件目前仅在美国站的亚马逊Listing页面上运行。

Use the engine of the GPT-3.5-turbo.
插件使用的是GPT-3.5-turbo人工智能引擎驱动。

Based on current title and bullet points upgrade, include tone.
基于Listing页面当前标题和要点，优化文字内容，包括语气。

In the next version, we will add some new features, so stay tuned...
接下来的版本中，我们会加入一些新的功能，敬请期待...
